title: BONUS episode - Sociology on the syllabus
description: In this BONUS episode, Matthew talks to Alex Buckley about the campaign to get Sociology on the syllabus at all schools. Alex explains how Sociology could and should be incorporated into the national curriculum for years 7-9. You can also read more about this here - http://www.sociologyonthesyllabus.org/
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
